Starting with our data file, calc.txt:

```
4 * 6
5 + 6
457 - 75
54 / 3
4 + 6
```

calc.R then looks like:

```R
file_lines <- readLines("calc.txt")
line_tokens <- strsplit(file_lines, " ")

for (tokens in line_tokens) {
  lhs <- as.numeric(tokens[[1]])
  operator <- tokens[[2]]
  rhs <- as.numeric(tokens[[3]])
  
  if (operator == "+") {
    cat(tokens, "is", lhs + rhs, "\n")
  } else if (operator == "-") {
    cat(tokens, "is", lhs - rhs, "\n")
  } else if (operator == "*") {
    cat(tokens, "is", lhs * rhs, "\n")
  } else if (operator == "/") {
    cat(tokens, "is", lhs / rhs, "\n") 
  }
}
```

```
Rscript calc.R

4 * 6 is 24 
5 + 6 is 11 
457 - 75 is 382 
54 / 3 is 18 
4 + 6 is 10 
```
